description:
Ripping and tearing their way through www.taleofpainters.com today are the rage-fuelled Death Company. You had better hope you don't have a passing resemblance for Horus Lupercal, otherwise they want to have words with you! In today's showcase post, I'll share photos of my Death Company and a recipe card showing how I painted them.

The post Showcase: Blood Angels Death Company with Jump Packs (inc. painting guide) appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Blood Angels Death Company with Jump Packs (inc. painting guide)
